all_questions.question: What is the base line required for calculating the exact distance of the Sun from London or Brighton?

all_questions.question: How were the altitudes of the Sun taken at London and Ackworth to calculate the distance of the Sun?

all_questions.question: What is the angle of altitude used to calculate the vertical distance of the Sun from Earth?
all_questions.context: The altitude at L and at B taken at the same moment of time will give the distance L S or B S.

all_questions.question: What is the estimated magnitude of the Sun, Moon, Stars, etc. compared to Earth?
